# Exercice 6

## 1

```{r}
f <-function(x){
  return(2/pi * sqrt(1 - x**2) * (x >= -1 & x <= 1))
}

g <- function(x){
  return(1/2 * (x >= -1 & x <= 1))
}

M <- 4/pi

accept_reject <- function(n){
  x <- numeric(0)
  while(length(x) < n){
    U <- runif(1)
    X <- runif(1, -1, 1)
    x <- append(x, X[U <= (f(X) / (M * g(X)))])
  }
  return(x)
}
```

```{r}
t <- seq(-1, 1, 0.01)
n <- 10000

hist(accept_reject(n), freq = FALSE, breaks = 10)
lines(t, f(t), col = "red", lwd = 2)
```
